info.title: Horix POS Pro API Documentation
info.description: Horix POS Pro - Offline-First Point of Sale System API. Comprehensive REST API with sync capabilities, batch operations, variant products, and multi-tenant support.

get.summary: Filter brands with search

post.summary: Delete multiple brands

get.summary:
Get brands with flexible pagination

Supports multiple modes via query parameters:
- No params: Returns all (limit 1000)
- ?limit=100: Returns first 100 (flat array)
- ?page=1&per_page=10: Offset pagination (management tables)
- ?cursor=123&per_page=100: Cursor pagination (sync operations)

get.summary: Display a listing of the resource

post.summary:
Store a newly created resource in storage.

Supports three product types:
- simple: Simple product with one stock entry
- variant: Batch product with multiple stock entries (batch numbers)
- variable: Product with attribute-based variants (e.g., Size: S, M, L)

put.summary: Update the specified resource in storage

delete.summary: Remove the specified resource from storage

get.summary:
Get product or variant by barcode.

Searches both product barcodes and variant barcodes.
Returns the matched entity with full details

Display a listing of the resource.

Supports multiple pagination modes:
- Default: ?limit=1000 (all with safety limit)
- Dropdown: ?limit=50 (flat array for dropdowns)
- Table: ?page=1&per_page=20 (offset pagination for tables)
- Sync: ?cursor=0&per_page=500 (cursor-based for batch sync)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Mode 4: Default - all items with safety limit

get.summary:
Get all batches for a product
GET /api/products/{id}/batches

post.summary:
Select batches automatically based on product's batch selection strategy
POST /api/products/{id}/select-batches

get.summary:
Get all batches for a variant
GET /api/variants/{id}/batches

Get batches expiring within specified days
GET /api/batches/expiring?days=30

Get expired batches
GET /api/batches/expired

Get batch details with current stock and history
GET /api/batches/{id}

Get movement history for a specific batch
GET /api/batches/{id}/movements
